summary: This test module verifies the behavior of AWS Auto Scaling policy operations using the boto3 SDK within a mocked AWS environment. It includes a helper to configure an Auto Scaling group and a suite of test cases that exercise creating, deleting, executing, and updating scaling policies, checking that the expected API interactions and outcomes occur.
business_intent: Validate that Auto Scaling policy management functions correctly in automated cloud infrastructure workflows, ensuring reliable scaling actions during deployment and runtime.
